channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside number 46 Chester Rd, N19, 27th October
item.description:
The fabric supporting the tree trunk has snapped and this young trees is leaning. I'm concerned the tree will snap in a strong wind.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18-56, Chester Road, Dartmouth Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bottles with strange substance, 27th October
item.description:
These bottles have been by this lamp post for over a week which shows the street is overlooked and not cleaned. We are constantly having cars park there and leave their litter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bognor Road, West Heath, London

item.title: New large areas of graffiti, 27th October
item.description:
There is a new large area of graffiti on the side of our block where the new bins have created a platform for antisocial behaviour. In addition, scaffolding has been erected and left unsecured, creating an additional platform graffiti up the side.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin with open bags spilling on to footpath, 27th October
item.description:
Someone has put rubbish into a bin that was already overflowing. Either the bag was not properly closed. And/or foxes have already been in at it. I have no doubt that by the end of today this will be be lying all over the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gables Close, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 fly tipped bikes., 27th October
item.description:
3 bikes fly tipped behind the wall on Marlton Street. Satti Heir at Greenwich Envirocrime has been directly informed. We have lots of CCTV coverage. 3 men filmed wheeling the bikes down. We are gathering info on who they are.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marlton Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 27th October
item.description:
A fridge freezer has been dumped which has become a hazard as children were playing with it and the glass shattered. Also one of the children whilst playing locked another child inside. Please remove asap.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Darenth Road, Hackney, London
